attachShaders

public void attachShaders()
Description copied from class: ShaderProgram

Overrides:
attachShaders in class ShaderProgram

releaseShaders

public void releaseShaders()
Description copied from class: ShaderProgram
Disables shaders (unbind), then detaches and releases the shaders associated with this program. This can be called after linking a program in order to free up memory (as the shaders are no longer needed), however, since it is not a commonly used feature and thus not well tested on all drivers, it should be used with caution. Shaders shouldn't be used after being released.

Overrides:
releaseShaders in class ShaderProgram
